short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrate your NetFortris Fonality cloud phone system into Microsoft Office 365™.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using your NetFortris Fonality phone system click phone numbers and extensions to make calls through your Chrome browser from your Microsoft Outlook™ on the web. 

• Contacts 

• Emails and email previews 

• Calendar events 

• Skype chat and contacts
